name: 【SD2】Scream-SemiRealistic
description:
This is a model of the SD2 series, so it is not compatible with the Lora/embedding for SD1.

This is a merged model of Replicant V3 and WaifuDiffusion 1.5 Beta 2 Frosty Aesthetic.

This model does not include NovelAI leak.

I recommend using the following two negative embeddings:

  • Mayng(https://huggingface.co/852wa/hakoMay/blob/main/Mayng.safetensors)

  • ParaNegative(https://huggingface.co/p1atdev/Realgar-v1/blob/main/ParaNegative.safetensors)

License

Scream-SemiRealistic is released under the Fair AI Public License 1.0-SD (https://freedevproject.org/faipl-1.0-sd/), the same as WD 1.5. If you create a derivative of this model, please share your changes accordingly. Thanks to ronsor/undeleted (https://undeleted.ronsor.com/) for their help with the license.

meta.prompt:
(exceptional, best aesthetic, new, newest, best quality, masterpiece, extremely detailed, anime, waifu:1.2)
BREAK
1girl, solo, silver hair, blue eyes, white jacket, street, night, neon lights
meta.negativePrompt: real life, realistic, photo, lowres, ((bad anatomy)), ((bad hands)), missing finger, extra digits, fewer digits, blurry, ((mutated hands and fingers)), (poorly drawn face), ((mutation)), ((deformed face)), (ugly), ((bad proportions)), ((extra limbs)), extra face, (double head), (extra head), ((extra feet)), monster, logo, cropped, worst quality, jpeg, humpbacked, long body, long neck, ((jpeg artifacts)), deleted, old, oldest, ((censored)), ((bad aesthetic)), (mosaic censoring, bar censor, blur censor)
